title: PIMCO Municipal Income Fund (PMF) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: PIMCO Municipal Income Fund ( PMF  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.06 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased PMF prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 19th quarter that PMF has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $14.92, the dividend yield is 4.83%.
The previous trading day's last sale of PMF was $14.92, representing a -2.67% decrease from the 52 week high of $15.33 and a 22.8% increase over the 52 week low of $12.15.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the PMF Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
